sentences.en: Along the Rh ? ne Valley, occasional strong , cold , dry , north - to - northwesterly wind known as the mistral .
sentences.cn: 罗讷山谷沿线偶尔会出现从北部吹响西北的干冷的强风。

sentences.en: Along the Rh ? ne Valley, occasional strong , cold , dry , north - to - northwesterly wind known as the mistral.
sentences.cn: 罗 讷 山谷沿线偶尔会出现从北部吹响西北的干冷的强风.

sentences.en: Suddenly he felt the fresh and sharp night air and he knew that the mistral was blowing.
sentences.cn: 突然间，他呼吸到了夜晚新鲜寒冷的空气，他知道这是寒冷干燥的强风。

sentences.en: When the mistral blew in winter, the view past Cannes revealed the peaks of Corsica; the coal stove in the kitchen yielded little hot water or heat.
sentences.cn: 冬天，地中海干冷的北风呼啸而过，一过戛纳，就可以望见科西嘉岛的群峰了。 小屋厨房中的煤炉几乎没有热气，也热不了水。

trans.tran_cn: （法国南部干冷而强劲的北风或西北风）密史脱拉风，干燥寒冷的北风
trans.tran_en: a strong cold dry wind that blows through the Rhone valley and S France to the Mediterranean coast, mainly in the winter
